title: The.Road.Trip-PLAZA
description:
DOWNLOAD THE LASEST PC GAMES AND UPDATES AT: GoodOldDownloads.com

PLAZA PRESENTS    

The Road Trip (c) Red Sky Studios                      


Release Date :  05/2018                     Protection : Steam                                                  
Discs        :  1                           Genre      : Violent                       

During this adventure horror game you and your uncle  will  hit  the
road in search  for the  amazing MrRibs!  You are  just  an  average
overweight man in his mid thirties that wants nothing more  then  to
accomplish his dream of buying all the MrRibs he can. The  MrRibs is
only available for one week then moves on to the next city.  You and
your uncle have no idea what to expect on this wild journey!

For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/856320/

1. Extract release 
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!

General Notes:

- Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from 
trying to go online ..
- If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
